events.name: The Blackout Incident
events.description: A massive power surge fried the grid in Sector 4. Kael was framed for the sabotage.

events.name: The Awakening
events.description: Kael wakes up in Doc Riley's workshop with a new cybernetic arm and memory gaps.

events.name: The Message
events.description: Kael receives an encrypted message from an unknown sender (Mara) warning him to run.

events.name: Bar Confrontation
events.description: Kael goes to The Black Lotus to find a fixer but runs into Mara instead.

events.name: The Raid
events.description: Corporate death squads raid the bar. Kael and Mara are forced to fight their way out together.
